name: Bloodpool
description:
Covid burnout means i did not get as far as id like to with this project, so enjoy this little prototype! 

How to play 

Player 1 WASD

Player 2 Up, Down, Left, Right

To attack press up to ready your sword then right or left to attack

Kill Chickens to get health

The further you are apart the bigger your health bar. Defeat the ChiKing. 

A couple of bugs....

1: Slidy Boys: sometimes the player will slide due to some random physics jank

2: Random damage, sometimes the player will take some random damage from an unknown source

3: No sound (SORRY)
